name: Radioactive Depths
description:
Year 2164. Humanity has polluted the world and gone extinct. Now the water is toxic and you, last member of the turtles, are stuck in a small islands, eatting what you find untill the tide goes down, allowing you to travel to the next island. Avoid predators, toxic pools and the rain by covering inside your shell, but you better move, the water is rising again... 

Made for the Turtle Gam Jam.

CONTROLS:

-UP/DOWN ARROW: Move;

-LEFT/RIGHT ARROW: rotate;

HOLD CONTROL: shell;
